banner: Hey! I'm an engineering student at the University of Michigan who has risked her life dabbling in CSS to bring you this website. Thank you for your time today - I hope you enjoy your stay.
about: Based in the DM(V) and studying in Ann Arbor, I'm an experienced software engineer with extensive knowledge in web development and data science. Aside from my unhealthy obsession with React, in my free time I enjoy being an amateur musician and dedicated gym rat.
